Text: will this work for tiger or only on leopard?
This is the last beta version that left for Tiger.
the beta versions have expired and will no longer create new partitions. the only way to create new bootcamp partitions is to install leopard i think

It actually works if you set the time back, do what you need (e.g. burn driver disk) then set the time back to normal.

For boot matters i still prefer Refit
So Does this work for tiger? - IS THERE any way to get bootcamp for tiger? cuz i dont want to download leapord as it takes forever, or spend 130.
To get the beta to work you have to set your date back to 2005 for the installation, after that you can set it back. Then it should work fine.
Just set your date prior to 2007. I think it was prior to 12/31/2007, but just to be safe, set it to late 2006 or early 2007. I believe it should work that way.
